cgcloud__Sales_Folder_Sell_Sheet__c.name: cgcloud__Sales_Folder_Sell_Sheet__c
cgcloud__Sales_Folder_Sell_Sheet__c.description: This object stores the details of the relationship between the sales folder and sell sheet.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the sales folder sell sheet record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales Organization to which the sales folder sell sheet assignment of the sales folder (and the sales folder itself) belongs.

cgcloud__Sell_Sheet_Unique__c.description: This field ensures that one sell sheet is attached only once to a sales folder. It's a concatenation of Sales Folder Id and Sell Sheet Id. This field is updated by a Workflow.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sort field for the Sales Folder Sell Sheet.
